metadata.title: CVE-2020-27795 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A segmentation fault was discovered in radare2 with adf command. Inlibr/core/cmd_anal.c, when command "adf" has no or wrong argument,anal_fcn_data (core, input + 1) --> RAnalFunction *fcn = r_anal_get_fcn_in(core->anal, core->offset, -1); returns null pointer for fcn causingsegmentation fault later in ensure_fcn_range (fcn).

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
